source.4acfed72: Because a line graph works but increasing the independent variable and then graphing the change of the dependent variable. Without sorting,the line would be going back and forth all over the place (see below)
source.c7ba0cef: 10) Why is it a good idea to first sort the values by your indepedent variable before doing a line graph?
source.dbb3011d: b) A math score of 460 is below the box on the graph so it is likely that the verbal score is also below the box. Therfore, the verbal score is likely between the range of 400 and 425.
